properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 9 at 11:34PM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
Through 2 AM Monday expect southwest winds of 35 to 40 mph
sustained with gusts approaching 60 mph to occur along Interstate
80 between mile markers 266 and 274. If traveling Interstate 80
late this evening into early Monday morning...be prepared for
sudden wind gusts that could blow your vehicle off the road. Winds
are expected to slowly ease through 2 AM Monday. The Wyoming
Department of Transportation has closed this portion of Interstate
80 to light weight and high profile vehicles until further
notice.

NWSheadline: STRONG WINDS WITH INCREASED BLOWOVER RISK ALONG INTERSTATE 80 NEAR ARLINGTON
